pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, April 19, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

 Hamilton, Ontario  

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in serving the St. Patrick’s Church Good Friday community lunch, and attend the Good Friday service. Minister of Seniors Filomena Tassi, and Member of Parliament for Hamilton East—Stoney Creek Bob Bratina will be in attendance.

St. Patrick’s Roman Catholic Church
440 King Street East

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity of lunch service
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.

 

North York, Ontario 

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Bernard Betel Centre’s 48th Annual Community Seder, and deliver brief remarks. Member of Parliament for York Centre Michael Levitt, Member of Parliament for Don Valley West Robert Oliphant, Member of Parliament for Eglinton—Lawrence Marco Mendicino, and Member of Parliament for Willowdale Ali Ehsassi will be in attendance.

Bernard Betel Centre
1003 Steeles Avenue West
                 

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage of brief remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:45 p.m.
